job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltbrgtltstronggtsummaryltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtimagine what you could do here at apple great ideas have a way of becoming great products services and customer experiences very quickly bring passion and dedication to your job and theres no telling what you could accomplishltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtkey qualificationsltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtexperience with containers and container management platforms such as kubernetesltbrgtltbrgtfamiliarity with workflows system and state convergence modelltbrgtltbrgtfamiliarity with software as a serviceltbrgtltbrgtfamiliarity with postgres technologiesltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtdescriptionltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtwe are a software development team that develops and operates large scale database services such as cassandra redis and postgres our work involves the development of the control plane and infrastructure to operate these databases at scale we are currently building new infrastructure to operate relational databases at scale starting with postgres we are in the process of building a team of software engineers to help us accomplish this goalltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggteducation ampamp experienceltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtbs or ms in computer science related fields or equivalent work experienceltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtrole number ltbrgtltbrgt
